r.d: PhD is a PHP based Docbook renderer aimed to replace Docbook-XSL and various other requirements needed to build the PHP.net documentation.
r.n: - Added PDF output format. (Rudy) - Added support for phpdoc:classref. (Hannes) - Added support for phpdoc:varentry. (Hannes) - Added support for the phpdoc howto. (Hannes) - Renamed phpdoc:exception to phpdoc:exceptionref. (Hannes) - Fixed bug#45627 (Unix manpages using non-standard folder name). (Rudy) - Fixed bug#45626 (Unix manpages should be gzipped). (Rudy) - Fixed bug#45618 (Bad filenames in man pages). (Rudy) - Fixed unclosed div element on set pages. (Hannes)
